channel.title: How To on MuST Tutorial
channel.description: Recent content in How To on MuST Tutorial

item.title: First time logging in
item.description: The hub has MuST and ASE installed. Each user gets their own jupyter notebook environment on the hub. First time logging in: Click on “hub” to connect to the jupyter hub. Enter your username Choose a password (remember this password for future logins!) Click ‘Sign In’ Wait for your server to start Jupyter hub basics Once your server is up and running, you will see your dashboard

item.title: Cloning a git repository
item.description: Cloning a git repository Open a terminal git clone
